"My Love....

"Your trust is the most basic foundation of our true love." "Loyalty in our relationships not only brings emotional stability but also increases intimacy levels, what I learned from you." "Your timely support help me to settle. If you were not there, I would not be able to what I have achieved in my life.
" "You take care of my feelings just like yours and I really express my gratitude towards you for the same. " "I really love for Self confidence. Its really invaluable and means everything for dealing with adversity, such as dealing with family members, friends, the pressure in college and the tough time. " "I have never met any other person with the same kind hearted and strength you have. " "
" "You will achieve a lot in life my love and I know that the upcoming challenge will not pull you down. " "You will show your beauty and strength to the world and get the results that will convince you. " "

I was the one you always dreamed of, You were the one I tried to draw How dare you say it's nothing to me? Baby, you're the only light I ever saw
Where There is a Charity and Wisdom, There is Neither fear nor Ignorance.
If At First You Dont Succeed. Fixed Your PONYTAIL and Try Again.
Sometimes I look at you and I wonder How I got to Be So Damn Lucky.
I dont think You Understand How IMPORTANT Its for me to Hear the Sound of Your Voice Everyday.
You are not just another person, you are the love of my life.
When you really Care About Someone, Their Mistakes Never change our Feelings Because The Minds Get Angry but The Heart that Still Cares.
Strength and Beauty must go Hand in Hand.
